The company allows you to split your vacations into shorter periods equal to 7 days each.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of child's birth, wedding, close relatives' loss, employees are also granted up to 5 days' paid leave. The vacation is to be used 1 week before and within 2 weeks after the occurrence of the event and cannot be split into shorter periods.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember that for any type of leave you need to create a vacation request at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/epm-vts-web/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"vacation.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Google Chrome is the only supported browser).
